sense.def:
Kadar se bo nekaj zgodilo
shortly
, se bo zgodilo kmalu. Kadar se je nekaj zgodilo
shortly after something else
, se je zgodilo kmalu za nečim drugim.

seg.quote: She died in an accident shortly afterwards.
Shortly before dawn he had an idea.

sense.def:
Kadar z nekom govorimo
shortly
, govorimo jezno ali nepotrpežljivo.

seg.quote: ‘You ought to be in bed,’ I said shortly.
